title: Invocations
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

**Invocations** denotes how skillful your character is at beseeching a [deity](/God "God") for help. It improves the power and/or success rate of most god-given powers. (For some gods, piety also has this effect.)

Invocations also increases your maximum [MP](/MP "MP"), but does not stack with [Spellcasting](/Spellcasting "Spellcasting") and is only half as effective.

## Applicable Gods

Invocations skill is useful when worshipping one of the following [gods](/God "God"):

- [Beogh](/Beogh "Beogh")
- [Cheibriados](/Cheibriados "Cheibriados")
- [Dithmenos](/Dithmenos "Dithmenos")
- [Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon")
- [Fedhas Madash](/Fedhas_Madash "Fedhas Madash")
- [Hepliaklqana](/Hepliaklqana "Hepliaklqana")
- [Lugonu](/Lugonu "Lugonu")
- [Makhleb](/Makhleb "Makhleb")
- [Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh")
- [Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru")
- [Qazlal](/Qazlal "Qazlal")
- [Sif Muna](/Sif_Muna "Sif Muna")
- [The Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One")
- [Uskayaw](/Uskayaw "Uskayaw")
- [Yredelemnul](/Yredelemnul "Yredelemnul")
- [Zin](/Zin "Zin")

The remaining gods do not use Invocations skill:

- [Kikubaaqudgha](/Kikubaaqudgha "Kikubaaqudgha")'s abilities are powered by [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy").
- [Ashenzari](/Ashenzari "Ashenzari"), [Gozag](/Gozag "Gozag"), [Ignis](/Ignis "Ignis"), [Jiyva](/Jiyva "Jiyva"), [Ru](/Ru "Ru"), [Trog](/Trog "Trog"), and [Wu Jian](/Wu_Jian "Wu Jian") give abilities that are independent of skills.
- [Vehumet](/Vehumet "Vehumet") and [Xom](/Xom "Xom") don't provide any active abilities.

## History

- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), you could train this skill only if your god used it or if you had a [manual](/Manual "Manual") of Invocations.
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), Nemelex Xobeh's abilities were based on Evocations.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), Jiyva's abilities were based on Invocations.
- Prior to [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), Invocations required 80% as much XP in order to train, but all species' aptitudes were 1 lower.
